DocumentTemplate.name: Parental Leave Policy
DocumentTemplate.description: Company-wide policy outlining the conditions for parental leaves.
DocumentTemplate.Preambel: This policy constitutes an addendum to the employment contract between ${{company-full-name}} (hereafter ${{company-short-name}}) and its employees. It becomes active on ${{active-from}}.

ChoiceVariable.description: Should adoptions be covered as well?
ChoiceVariable.Option: before and after child birth or after adopting a child

NumberVariable.label: Days of leave granted
NumberVariable.description: Women must take at least to... (see law ยง3...)

ParagraphTemplate.Verbatim: All permanent employees can decide to take parental leave. The government offers x days of leave. On top of that, employees can take x additional days of leave ${event}.

ChoiceVariable.descriptions: What kind of partners should be covered?

ParagraphTemplate.Verbatim: Parental leave can also be taken when the employee's ${partnership-status} becomes a parent.

SectionTemplate.heading: During Parental Leave
SectionTemplate.Preambel: Provisions in this section control the erelationship between ${{company-short-name}} and employees that are on parental leave.

NumberVariable.description: Share of salary during parental leave

ParagraphTemplate.Verbatim: During their parental leave, ${{company-short-name}} will continue to pay ${compensation-percent}% of their normal salary to employees. Employees will also receive ${compensation-percent}% of any salary-dependent benefits. All others benefits will be paid for in full by ${{company-short-name}}.
The potential range for any discretionary bonuses will not be affected by parental leave.

StringVariable.description: Name or role of contact during leave

SectionTemplate.StringVariable: The employee's access to all systems will be blocked during their parental leave. The primary contact during leave is ${contact}.
